name: starthere
description: To test your computer setup. 1. Checkout this repository 2. Open a terminal window 3. Change into the "starthere" folder:    cd starthere 4. Run:    npm install 5. Start a SQL Server:    service mysql start 6. Run a server:    npm start 7. Browse to localhost:8080 and the result will be a json formatted query of the database: [{"id":1,"title":"1984","author":"George Orwell"},{"id":2,"title":"To Kill a Mockingbird","author":"Harper Lee"},{"id":3,"title":"Brave New World","author":"Aldous Huxley"}]
